    • replacePersonel

      public static void replacePersonel​(java.util.Scanner scanIn, Project tempProject, int ProjectID, java.lang.String Type)
      Replace a personel ID inside a project Method interacts with user, requesting detail needed for new project creation Adds the new project to the project list
      Parameters:
      scanIn - A scanner to allow reading input from console
      tempProject - the current project object the user wants to change
      ProjectID - A integer containing the project ID the user wants to make changes to
      Type - A string containing the specific personel type the user wants to change
